aya yanu ma jiwithaye ridmaya bawa mata watahi giye ma aya dutu mul dinayedimaya.me wiparitha lokaye kalaya nimeshayen nimeshaya gewi yaddi aya mage jiwithaye rangana ekama rupikawa bawata pathwiya.ma siyalla amathaka kara ayata aadare karannata wiya.ee aramunu hina wi giya mage jiwathayata aruthbara aluthbara aramunu ee aadaraya sapayu nisaweni.api lagama mithuran bawata pathwiya.aya dun aramunu pasupasa mama hathi nobala diwagiyemi.aya nirathuruwa ma diriganwiya.mage adupadu penwa duni.apa athare aadara igi huwamaru wuwada ma ayata ho aya mata aadare yayi nokiyawini.me athara waraye jiwithaya balaporoththumatha goda nagamin uswu kadumudunata mama naggemi.nilwan his ahase mage hitha sarisaruwe apirimitha nidahasakini.ma ee tharamata ayata aadare kalemi.mata sama witama sithune ayada elasama wewi yayi kiyaya.dinak mama ayata aadare kimata sarasuni.namuth edina mithuriya aadarawanthiyak kara ganimata daiwaya ida dunne natha.aya edinama an ayekuge aadarawanthiyak wi thibuni.mama ayata jiwithaya jayagannata subhapathuwa misa mage sitha prakasha kale natha.ma ayath samaga sinaha wi katha kalada hadawatha ikibidina hada sitha thula wedana duni.ma nohada sitimata uthsaha kalada kadulu bidu mata awanatha wuye natha.mama rahase haduwemi.namuth ee wedanawa kadulu walin diya kara damiya nohaki waga ma hodakarawama dana sitiyemi.aya thawamath mage sitha thula lagumgena siti.namuth aya thawamath mithuriyakma pamani.aya nisawen mata mage jiwithayata labunu abhiyoga mata jayaganimata ithiriwa atha.eyin ekak hara mata an siyallama jayagatha hakibawa sitha danimi.mata jayagatha nohakke oba pamani.emanisa ma yanu aniyam pemaka pangukaruweki.ma dannne oba mata nimmathi wasanthayak kiya pamani....namuth ee wasanthaya matanam rosa malaka pethi gilihennata malwassak ada halunu wasanthayak pamani.mata liyanna kiyanna aramunu dun obata ma ee siyalla pudadenuye aramunu hina wu mata oba dun nimak nomathi wasanthaya nisaweni.......
